overview: A Photography and Video project conducted in partnership with AEPGA (Association for the Study and Protection of Asininio Livestock) and the Municipality of Alfândega da Fé in Northeast Portugal, Faith in Donkeys seeks to enhance the complicity of the man-animal relation, with particular relevance to the dumb, donkeys, mules and males, leaning on the present reality, and its cultural & social legacy.
title: Fé nos Burros
